
# BLOXPLOT
```{r}

boxplot(trees$Volume,
        main = "Árvores",
        xlab = "Volume")


boxplot(trees$Volume,
        main = "Árvores",
        xlab = "Volume",
        #col = "blue",
        horizontal = TRUE)

boxplot(trees$Volume,
        main = "Árvores",
        xlab = "Volume",
        #col = "blue",
        horizontal = TRUE,
        outline = FALSE)


```
